Test Name: Helicobacter pylori Culture with Antimicrobial Susceptibility Testing
Purpose: To isolate Helicobacter pylori and determine its antimicrobial susceptibility to guide diagnosis and treatment.
Container: Sterile transport medium/container suitable for gastric specimens
Equipment: Microaerophilic incubator, Helicobacter pylori selective agar plates, antimicrobial susceptibility discs or E-test strips, standard microbiology tools
